summary: The module implements a comprehensive suite of decoder classes that transform raw binary data of numerous network and wireless protocols into structured, human‑readable objects, handling Ethernet, IP, ICMP, ARP, DHCP, CDP, IPv6 extensions, and a full range of IEEE 802.11 frame types including management, control, data and encrypted payloads.
business_intent: To provide security tools, network forensics and penetration‑testing applications with reliable parsing capabilities, allowing analysts to inspect, analyze and manipulate captured traffic across wired and wireless protocols.
